Before you can say anything she drops you into a deep glass so that you can not escape while she thinks. "Now what would be the best way to eat you? Oh, there are so many choices! Hmm...ah I know how about a sandwich, or maybe I should cook you in my gas oven by resizing you for a roast. What do you think," Renee asked. You were amazed to hear her give you a choice. "You do realize that if I make you into a sandwich I will be using lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, and perhaps some ketchup," She says. You think that the sandwich sounds nice, of course if you get resized you may stand a better chance to escape. "I'm waiting," Renee said while tapping her shoe on the floor and her fingers on the counter. TAP, TAP, TAP.

You decide to...
14521.title: Renee's Lunch.

choices: Renee comes alone to eat......
Renee and Michelle come into the kitchen......
145212.content:
You couldn’t believe that you were actually thinking about letting this beautiful woman roast you. It wasn’t as if you had a choice…well not really. You looked up to her and told her that you chose to be roasted. A smile crossed her lips showing you her perfect white teeth and a chill was sent down your spine. She walked over to the counter as you watched her perfect ass move in her jeans through the glass. "You're sure you want to be my roast," She asked you. You reluctantly shook head yes and she used her shrinking power.. After a moment of dizziness you started to grow and the glass shattered as you grew to twenty inches. You decide to try and run, but then you feel a sharp pain on the back of your head before everything goes dark.

Half an hour later....
         As you come to you hear Renee's voice humming and you feel a massaging on your belly. Slowly you open your eyes to see Renee rubbing butter over your naked body and you realize that you're lying in a roasting pan. "You aren’t really going to roast me are you Renee," You asked. She just kept humming as she sprinkled garlic and pepper over you. Suddenly you hear a loud beep and you jump a little. "It's okay honey," Renee said, "It's just the oven reaching 400 degrees"
         Renee continued to hum as she picked up a bowl and dumped carrots and potatoes from it all around you. You screamed as she picked up the pan heading for the oven. You try desperately to move and escape but the blow she gave you must have paralyzed you because you just couldn’t move. Renee opened the oven door and slid the pan in and you screamed frantically trying to change her mind, but she shut the door and you knew that was the end. You felt your skin start to tingle as the heat you and the pan and the smell of roast with vegetables filled your nostrils. You begged and screamed but you don’t think Renee could even here you. You were in that oven for about two hours before Renee came and took you out. She licked her lips as she sat you on the table. You had roasted to death. The doorbell rang and Renee walked away from you.
145212.title: Roasted Alive.

1452122.content:
"Will Michelle It looks like dinner is finally ready. he was definitely ripe for cooking he was tender in all the right places." Renee said looking at her daughter.
"He was so easy, teenage boys are such easy prey." Michelle said with a smile.
Renee picked the tray up and carried you to the table. Michelle Went a got a bottle of the best champagne and two glasses. This calls for a celebration. A truly fine meal."
Renee got out the carving knife and meat fork and sliced two stakes from your belly. and some potatoes and carrots on each of your plates. Michelle took a bite of your delicious meat followed by a carrot. "MM MM even the carrots are filled with his juicy goodness."
a little while latter they scrape the non edible parts into the garbage can not giving you a second thought.
" so who is the next lucky gut to be your new boyfriend, Steve is a nice guy,"
nah he is to skinny I was thinking about Robert. He was a lineman for the varsity until his grades mad him unable to play Michelle answered.
"Sounds perfect, why not invite him over next Friday for dinner."
1452122.title: Renee and Michelle come into the kitchen......

choices: Stuck in chocolaty and cakey goodness.....
Michelle will have an apple and Jason pie......
14522.content:
"As much I would like to eat you I'm not going to. Jason, since you are my daughters boyfriend, it’s only fair to have her eat you," Renee said, "you are not good enough to be her boyfriend, but you are sweet enough to be her after dinner dessert." "Dessert," You say. She went on and told that she would either bake a cake then stick you in the piece that Michelle is going to eat or she will bake you into a personal sized apple pie for Michelle. She then sealed you in one of those plastic containers, put a couple of holes in it so you had air, and put you away till it is time.

Which dessert would you be a part of?
14522.title: Sweet Enough To Be Dessert For Your Girlfriend.

choices: Michelle hears you and gets you out......
She doesn't hear you, her mom returns with the ingredients for apple Jason pie..
145222.content:
Trapped in your plastic Tupperware prison, you can only watch and wait for Renee to prepare you. Maybe, just maybe, you'll get a chance to bring attention to yourself and have Michelle rescue you. For hours you sit back and wait, Renee coming in once in awhile to do this or that, but otherwise going about her business like you never existed. You finally get a glimmer of hope as you hear Michelle get home and her mom goes to greet her. "I'm glad you're back, honey, I'm going to run to the store to get some things for dessert tonight. I'm making you a special apple pie, so do me a favor and stay out of the kitchen for I've got a surprise for you." Renee tells her daughter, before kissing her on the cheek and hurrying out the door.
         You wait for another thirty minutes, worried that Michelle might not enter the kitchen as she is a good girl and usually listens to her mother. Just when you think you're screwed, Michelle walks in, thirsty for some juice, and the cups are a shelf below you. Shouting and screaming and waving your hands for all you're worth, you try desperately to get her attention. As she grabs the cup, she stops for a moment, as if she thought she heard something, and you yell louder hoping she hears you.

Does she hear you?
145222.title: A Sweet Treat for a Sweet Girl.

info.brief_description: I brought back this great interactive, that I had to take off awhile back to make room.
info.description:
You will be taking on the role of a 21 year-old guy named Jason. Jason, "You", have shrunk to 3 inches tall and have no clothes on now, but while trying to get help from a beautiful girl or woman that you saw, you were caught by her, but she has another plan for you. That plan is eating you, whether it is eaten plain by chewing or swallowing whole, or with the next meal she makes for herself, which could mean you will be put in a sandwich or cooked along with the other ingredients of the meal.
RULES:: PLEASE, DO NOT ADD TO THIS INTERACTIVE UNLESS YOU PLAN TO FOLLOW THE RULES.

1.) If Jason gets eaten, swallowed, or dies in another way, it will be the end of the story. Unless another shrunken guy is introduced after Jason’s death, then the point view goes to that guy in the second person perspective.
2.) If Jason gets swallowed whole, the only way he can survive is if the girl or woman throws up, or if the girl or woman falls asleep and he climbs up and out of her mouth. Jason can never at any point be immune to stomach acid. Also Jason can be killed in other ways, like being sat on.
3.)You can add new people to the interactive, but if you add a guy, Jason must have died already, he must be shrunk as well and eventually be eaten by a girl or woman. So, no giant guys, meaning no gay stuff, there can only be one guy in the scene at a time. There can be shrunken girls or women. Girls and women, must be between the ages of 16 to 35. Oh and don't change the names I give for people in each thread.
4.) No animals, insects or any other type of creature; only human people in this interactive.
5.)The starting out shrunken size is three inches. Now girls and women can have the shrinking power and resize Jason. The sizes that Jason can be are from 3 inches to 20 inches, no shorter, no bigger. This is basically see how long Jason can escape being eaten.
6.) The perspective must stay in the second person, for example: You jumped out of her mouth. You escaped.
7.)Unless it is decision making fork in the road spot; all editions must be at least a paragraph long, a paragraph is 7 to 12 sentences long, the minimum sentence count I will except is 6.

So follow the RULES, think before you write or I will DELETE. You don't what to waste time writing if you know that you broke the rules and you know it will be deleted.
